ModMetaData.name: Consistent Mech Textures
ModMetaData.author: RobTheRobotGuard
ModMetaData.description: Disables the ancient mech textures by forceing mechs to generate at ages below 100. Designed to be used with mech retexture mods...... TECHNICAL DETAILS: all the mod checks for is if the defaultFactionType is Mechanoid and then it defines a Max generation age which is set to 99. So this mod should work with any mods which use the default mech faction
